Motivating Challenges (4/4)
4. Data distribution
– Sometimes, the data is distributed across multiple locations
– Key challenges
• How to reduce the amount of communication needed to perform the 
computation
• How to divide the task across multiple locations and merge the partial results 
obtained from each location
